attributes.action: Ban ALL Hand luggage on every single flight
attributes.additional_details: Terrorism is still happening and we have to put barriers in place to stop it from happening - Let's get a LAW in place to STOP passengers carrying hand luggage then we can be one step closer to being safer!
attributes.background: After today's events on the Egyptair flight terrorists are still finding a way to get on-board passenger aircraft and being able to damage lives, We need to be STRICT on polices - the way to do this is having all airlines putting a STOP on hand luggage by law! We have to prevent terrorism happening!

rejection.details: The UK Parliament doesn't have the power to ban hand luggage on every flight across the world. You could start a new petition calling on Parliament to ban hand luggage on flights entering and leaving the UK.
